sentences.sContent: You must not  presume too much on the reliability of such sources.
sentences.sContent_eng: You must not presume too much on the reliability of such sources.
sentences.sCn: 你不应该过分指望这类消息来源的可靠性。

sentences.sContent: You have to work at it and design it in to your systems from the beginning, just like you have to design in scalability, performance, reliability and security.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have to work at it and design it in to your systems from the beginning, just like you have to design in scalability, performance, reliability and security.
sentences.sCn: 您从一开始就得学习它并将其设计到您的系统中，就像您在可伸缩性、性能、可靠性和安全性方面进行的设计一样。

sentences.sContent: Therefore certainty is not only something of no use, but is in fact damaging, if we value reliability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore certainty is not only something of no use, but is in fact damaging, if we value reliability.
sentences.sCn: 因此如果考虑可靠性的价值，确定性不仅仅没有用处，而且事实上还有害处。

phrases.pCn: 固有可靠性；本质可靠性
